mapper.select: select user_id AS id, username AS name, avatar, email, phone_number AS phone, sex, biography, is_admin from sys_user where username = #{name}

select n.id, n.content, n.item_id, n.updateTime, n.tradeTime, n.contact, n.author_id, u.user_id as author_id, u.username as author_username, u.avatar as author_avatar, u.sex as author_sex, n.confirm, n.recipient_id, r.user_id as recipient_id, r.username as recipient_username, r.avatar as recipient_avatar, r.sex as recipient_sex from sys_notice n inner join sys_user u on n.author_id = u.user_id inner join sys_user r on n.recipient_id = r.user_id where n.recipient_id = #{userId} and n.confirm = 0

select n.id, n.content, n.item_id, n.updateTime, n.tradeTime, n.contact, n.author_id, u.user_id as author_id, u.username as author_username, u.avatar as author_avatar, u.sex as author_sex, n.confirm, n.recipient_id, r.user_id as recipient_id, r.username as recipient_username, r.avatar as recipient_avatar, r.sex as recipient_sex from sys_notice n inner join sys_user u on n.author_id = u.user_id inner join sys_user r on n.recipient_id = r.user_id where n.recipient_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.confirm

select n.id, n.content, n.item_id, n.updateTime, n.tradeTime, n.contact, n.author_id, u.user_id as author_id, u.username as author_username, u.avatar as author_avatar, u.sex as author_sex, n.confirm, n.recipient_id, r.user_id as recipient_id, r.username as recipient_username, r.avatar as recipient_avatar, r.sex as recipient_sex from sys_notice n inner join sys_user u on n.author_id = u.user_id inner join sys_user r on n.recipient_id = r.user_id
